attributes.action: remove Great Britain from the Afghan and Iraq co-allition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to change our foreign policy and withdraw support for America's war on terror. The UK has fought terrorism succesfully for years without ever having to go to war in the middle east because of it. We need to distance ourselves from America's foreign policies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
